lines.text: Miss Waters, don't be worried about me losing any money in your show. I don't have any, but I'd still like to talk to you again.
Sweet corn, cormeal mush, corpone with cracklins,and corn whiskey.
Gold is nothing but that last corruption of degenerate man. But to be a little corrupt for the sake of art, that I wouldn't mind.
What'll you do if he does strike it rich?
I don't remember if it was Shakespeare or Aristotle, but one of them once said, "No one loves the man who he fears."
I... I want to tell you something I ain't never told anyone. I'm sorry for what I done to Jess.
Don't shoot. I'm out of bullets.
